GSD.description:
btrfs: fix race between quota enable and quota rescan ioctl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 6c22f86dd221eba0c7af645b1af73dcbc04ee27b. For more details please see the references link.
